org.grails.datastore.gorm.rest.client.utils
[Groovy] Class GrailsConverterHttpMessageConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.http.converter.AbstractHttpMessageConverter
      org.grails.datastore.gorm.rest.client.utils.GrailsConverterHttpMessageConverter

@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class GrailsConverterHttpMessageConverter
extends org.springframework.http.converter.AbstractHttpMessageConverter

A message converter that is capable of using Grails' converters API to write messages

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0
